body: ah yes alf, this is great!
This is so freaking hot, but also fucked up. This not NTR, but still dark. @SakuyaShirase Thanks for good explain.

Like people said, and Alp clarified, this isn't NTR with intention of it being. The girl never had any special feeling for MC besides a possible/new sex friend. MC even realized that he was misunderstanding things, so now its up to him if he wants to continue being a sex friend or not. Its understandable why people thought it was NTR, it showed MC feeling betrayed/cheated on after finding out she fucks around with another guy. (Though I'm surprised Alp had to clarify to Japanese readers even though the website its selling isn't tagged as NTR)

While I agree that the explanation on it not being NTR (especially if alp themselves confirmed it) is understandable, I still believe it’s kind of in a grey area. Even if he misunderstood and she was never “his” to begin with, the concept of NTR doesn’t always require an actual relationship or even mutual attraction between MC and FMC, at least from what I’ve read and come to understand of it. I’m not going to push the issue cause, surprisingly enough, it’s difficult to fit everything into neat and concise definitions, and mostly cause who really cares; also because the artist themselves came out and said so. Anyway, not really my thing regardless of if it’s literally NTR or not. I do hope this means Alp will be doing some darker stuff for a bit, been kinda bored the last couple years since most of their works have been SUPER vanilla.

I saw that a lot of people keep saying it NTR so I make this clear. It is not and the author even confirm that on twitter. Also fyi the MC misunderstand the whole thing due to his naïve thinking that the girl approach MC as a boyfriend when in fact she see him as sex friend. The same apply to the other guy he also her sex friend. Even MC admit it his fault for thinking such way.
